caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. A man is riding a horse, urging it on to catch up with a caravan ahead. The entire caravan stops under the shade of some trees, making camp once more. At a table nearby, two middle-aged men are enjoying a meal, their table filled with various desserts. They both seem a bit overweight but are happily chatting away. There are some cavalrymen on guard nearby, and the two men continue their conversation for a long time. The weather is beautiful, and they are in high spirits.At the same time, in another location during twilight, a group of nomads is encamped in their tents. A man and a woman are intimately involved, but the woman appears to be in pain. Meanwhile, in a different territory, several men are engaged in conversation.
